name: Slippery Ship
description:
Slippery ship is a retro style arcade shooter made for Jame gam # 15. Waves will progressively get harder and longer. See how long you can last against the enemy fleet!

Controls

Mouse 1: Fire and Move

Space: Slow and Hold position

R: Reload Weapon

ESC: Pause

Art created by me.

SFX created using SFXR.

Music created using SOUNDRAW.
